dc_description_s: Relief shown by contours and gradient tints.; Includes diagr. showing relation of Colorado to International map of the world and insets of "Canon City district," "Vicinity of Leadville, " "Part of city and county of Denver, " and "Cripple Creek district."|91 x 137 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:500,000; Approximately 8 miles to 1 inch|General Map Collection
